Title: Another Cinderella Story
Writer: Erik Patterson, Jessica Scott, Leigh Dunlap (characters)
Actors: Selena Gomez, Drew Seeley, Jane Lynch, Katharine Isabelle
Plot: Mary lives with her evil stepmom/sisters and slaves for them. At the high school masquerade ball, she gets to dance with her pop idol, Joey. Running home before midnight, she drops her Zune. Joey tries to find the girl who fits the Zune.
